data: Notwithstanding the baronetâ€™s polite invitation, and although Mr. Long did not return, as expected, upon the ensuing morning, I felt no inclination to exchange my solitude for the society of Mr. Gilmore at bowls.
Lost Sir Massingberd: A Romance of Real Life. v. 2/2
